summary: The BuildRequest contains no explicit requirements (and indicates the Great Follower Wall collage + per-name hover effects already exist). The diff introduces/changes multiple frontend and backend behaviors (new FollowerWall component, new aggregated-followers hook, CSS hover/animation styling, and significant backend follower/profile APIs). With no stated requirements, these appear to be unrequested additions relative to the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new Great Follower Wall background component that renders all follower names with pseudo-random positioning/rotation/scale and CSS-variable driven hover color.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified; the BuildRequest also states the wall collage + per-name hover effects are already implemented existing features, so adding a new component implementation is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a new React Query hook to aggregate followers across the last 30 days by repeatedly calling getFollowersForDay and deduplicating names client-side.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified; additionally, this changes how aggregated follower data is obtained (client-side aggregation over 30 days) without being requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented/changed global styling for notebook theme assets plus new Great Follower Wall styling/hover animation effects (as described in the file summary: bubble pop animations, glittery hover effects, sparkle animations).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified; the BuildRequest explicitly lists adding new animation behaviors beyond the existing per-name hover effect as a non-goal unless requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed backend functionality for user profiles and followers tracking (get/save caller profile; get/save followers for a given day) with access-control checks.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were specified, and the BuildRequest non-goals say not to add new backend endpoints or change persistence schema for follower data unless needed for a new user request.

hallucinated_features.description: Integrated the new FollowerWall into the main app UI as a background layer gated on authentication/profile state.
